targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({app="partners", job="ceramic/http", filename="/logs/ceramic/external/ceramic-elp-1-1/http-access.log"} | logfmt | __error__!="LogfmtParserErr" | status >= 200 and status < 300 | __error__!="LabelFilterErr" [$bucket]))
